summary: P2 Refactoring Testing - CoursesTab and CasesTab integration verified. Fixed 2 bugs in prop passing. File reduced from 2891 to 2391 lines as expected.
critical_code_review_comments: Found and fixed: contactIdToLoad was undefined, should be contactIdProp
Found and fixed: onCasesUpdate={loadCases} should be onCasesUpdate={loadCaseHistory} (loadCases function doesn't exist)
ContactSheet.jsx has React hook dependency warnings on lines 340 and 1159 - not blocking but could be improved
context_for_next_testing_agent: Google OAuth required for testing protected routes. ContactSheet tabs (Courses/Cases) require a contact to be selected to test full functionality. The extracted components CoursesTab and CasesTab use /lms/courses/* and /cases/* endpoints respectively.

coursesTab_integration.notes: CoursesTab correctly imported and integrated with proper props: contactId, courses, loadingCourses, onCoursesUpdate

casesTab_integration.notes: CasesTab correctly imported and integrated with proper props: contactId, contactName, caseHistory, loadingCases, onCasesUpdate

file_size_reduction.notes: ContactSheet.jsx reduced from 2891 to 2391 lines (-500 lines as expected)

lint_contactSheet.notes: No ESLint issues in ContactSheet.jsx after fixes

frontend_compiles.notes: webpack compiled with only hook dependency warnings, no errors

contactIdToLoad_undefined.fix: Changed to contactIdProp which is the correct destructured prop

loadCases_undefined.fix: Changed to onCasesUpdate={loadCaseHistory} which is the correct function
